name: PMB
description: PMB Project is a website application intended as an information system for new students to explore campus life and culture.

name: BNI Mobile Banking
description: BNI x RISTEK is a project aiming for some new features development for BNI Mobile Banking. This project includes research activities and provides a high-fidelity prototype as the final deliverables.

name: Houmi
description: Houmi is a mobile application that aims to create an innovative and sophisticated digital platform by developing the digitization of the property and real estate sector that will be able to assist in finding your dream home and all your home-related needs.

name: FK Urologi Website
description: FK Urologi System is an internal system for providing the doctor and nurse to process the flow of consultation.

name: Social+
description: Social+ is a big data platform where we can see current sentiments on topics taken from social media.

name: YLQ Al-Quran App
description: YLQ App is an Al quran where we can sort each surah based on the order of the verse, the location of Asmaul Husna, and the meaning of each word.

name: GRAV
description: A puzzle platformer where you can manipulate gravity direction. Made for B&W Jam

name: The Last Forest
description: Story of Elder Tree to Gather His Family. Made for Green Game Jam for Youth

name: STASIS
description: A Metroidvania Game with Stasis Gun to stasis enemies. Made for A Jam About TIME.

name: Rano Wei and The Anomaly of Time
description: A nonlinear maze-escaping game. With time manipulation abilities.

name: Infinite Hotel
description: A nonlinear maze-escaping game. With time manipulation abilities.

name: Playground NetSOS
description: A digital playground to hone your cybersecurity skills with various built-in simulated system vulnerability levels to choose and attack!
